traits.name: Dual Shields
entries: The giant carries two shields, each of which is accounted for in the giant's AC. The giant must stow or drop one of its shields to hurl rocks.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes two fireshield attacks.

actions.name: Fireshield
entries: Melee atk +13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 22 (4d6 + 8 damage) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6 damage) fire damage plus 7 (2d6 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Rock
entries: Ranged atk +13 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. 30 (4d10 + 8 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Shield Charge
entries: The giant moves up to 30 feet in a straight line and can move through the space of any creature smaller than Huge. The first time it enters a creature's space during this move, it makes a fireshield attack against that creature. If the attack hits, the target must also succeed on a DC 21 Strength saving throw or be pushed ahead of the giant for the rest of this move. If a creature fails the save by 5 or more, it is also knocked {@condition prone} and takes 18 (3d6 + 8 damage) bludgeoning damage, or 29 (6d6 + 8 damage) bludgeoning damage if it was already {@condition prone}.
